snippet: A tiebreaking 3-point play by Marshall Plumlee with 1 minute 14 seconds left helped 19th-ranked Duke beat North Carolina State for the third time in three meetings with a 92-89 victory in the Atlantic Coast Conference tournament’s second round in Washington.
lead_paragraph: A tiebreaking 3-point play by Marshall Plumlee with 1 minute 14 seconds left helped 19th-ranked Duke beat North Carolina State for the third time in three meetings with a 92-89 victory in the Atlantic Coast Conference tournament’s second round in Washington.
